product_name: Jetboil Sumo Titanium Companion Cup - 1.8 Liter
long_description: The Jetboil Sumo(TM) Titanium 1.8-liter Companion cup expands your lightweight cooking system so you can whip up meals and hot drinks for your group. 1.8-liter titanium FluxRing(R) cooking cup weighs only 10 oz., making it easy to take the cup along on backpacking trips. FluxRing(R) heat exchanger on the bottom creates excellent fuel efficiency. Sumo Titanium cup is large enough to stow a 100g or 230g Jetpower fuel canister and a Jetboil burner base (sold separately) with room to spare. Or, you can stow a complete Jetboil Sol or Zip system with a 100g fuel canister (sold separately) inside the Sumo. Sumo cup locks onto your Jetboil PCS, Flash, Sol or Zip burner base (sold separately) for a quick setup. Bottom cover unsnaps from the cooking cup to double as a measuring cup or bowl; measuring cup comes in handy when preparing meals and hot drinks. Drink-through lid features a pour spout and strainer holes. Due to flammable item shipping restrictions, we cannot sell fuel canisters online; they are available at REI retail stores.
short_description: The Jetboil Sumo(TM) Titanium 1.8-liter Companion cup expands your lightweight cooking system so you can whip up meals and hot drinks for your group.
